headline: How Should Investors View Lennar After the Recent 14.8% Monthly Rally?
summary: If you have ever found yourself staring at Lennar’s ticker, wondering whether it is the right time to buy, hold, or move on, you are in good company. Lennar is no stranger to a roller-coaster stock chart. Over the past month, shares jumped a remarkable 14.8%, while the year-to-date move is almost flat. Stepping back a year, you will see a sharper drop of 19.6%. And if you have stuck with the company for the long haul, you have seen gains of over 93% in three years and 110.1% in five years...
